attributes.action: hold a General Election to allow for the return of a representative democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recognising that both the support of the electorate has changed since 2005 and that the current Prime Minister has not been democratically elected, we the undersigned request our right to elect officials to act on our behalf.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
